item.title: Ethereum Hello World Example using solc and web3
item.description: I’ve been trying to find an Ethereum Hello World example and came across Thomas Cont√©’s excellent post that shows how to compile and deploy an Ethereum smart contract with solc and web3. In the latest version of web3 the API has changed to be based on promises so I decided to translate Thomas' example. Let’s get started.
